client_profile_secondary_school_name: Instituto de Educación Secundaria IES Pablo Neruda Las Palmas de Gran Canaria
client_description_Summary_Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Castro Ramos Hernández at a charity gala in Madrid. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Castro Ramos Hernández is a 33 year old Software Developer from Spain.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
client_description_Family_Background: Castro Ramos Hernández is married to Valeria. They do not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Castro earned his secondary school diploma from Instituto de Educación Secundaria IES Pablo Neruda Las Palmas de Gran Canaria in 2010.
Castro completed his university studies at University of Barcelona in 2014.
He pursued addtionally further eduaction by attending Complutense University of Madrid and graduating in 2020.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Castro Ramos Hernández is a 33 year old Software Developer from Spain.
In 2016, Castro Ramos Hernández started working as a Software Developer at Tuenti Technologies S.L., marking the beginning of his successful career.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
While working, he saved 30000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has condo located in Málaga, worth 1048000 EUR.

He purchased condo in Santa Cruz de Tenerife, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 920000 EUR.
He inherited 720000 EUR from his grandmother, a well-known Real Estate Developer, in 2015, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
client_description_Client_Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in his ability to achieve financial success and security.
